member_organisations:
Los socios de AGRUCON son empresas españolas transformadoras de tomate: 
AGRAZ, ALGOSUR, ALSAT, CONESA, CONSERVAS CIDACOS, IAN, INPRALSA, NESTLE ESPAÑA, TOMATES DEL SUR
fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Budget, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Energy, Environment, Single market, Food Safety, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: Common Agricultural Policy (CAP), Climate Change (Emmissions Trading Scheme, ETS), Transatlantic Trade and Investment Partnership (TTIP), Brexit
organisation_name: Agrupacion Española de Fabricantes de Conservas Vegetales (AGRUCON)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: AGRUCON es socio de la FIAB (Federación Española de Industrias de Alimentación y Bebidas), TomatoEurope(Processors Association), AMITOM (Association Meditarraneenne Internationale de la Tomate) y el WPTC (World Processing Tomato Council)
goals__remit: Agrupar a las empresas fabricantes de conservas vegetales y representar, promover y defender sus intereses colectivos
